author: mrmitch
title: U F O  over the town
review: This is the only UFO themed set I own, It is interesting in its construction, pieces that to this day I have in no other LEGO set. Wasn't into the theme but picked it up at a discount, because a collector has a little of this and a little of that. I did have the mask but got rid of it(wish I had kept it now).  Has not been assembled in many years-doesn't really fit with LEGO town.

author: hustla187
title: A Fine Flying Saucer
review: I really like the overall design of this set. My friend owns this and I have to admit that it is a really good set. The transparent pieces are pretty cool but there are alot of them. The arms are wicked and great for abducting minifigs. 5 out of 5 for a detailed set.

author: PepperPizzaMan2585
title: WE COME IN PEACE!
review:
This a very cool UFO set. It's a flying saucer that spins! The minifigure is also very cool. Also, the mask is cool and looks like it could fit anybody. Here are my pros and cons.

Pros:
Saucer
Alien
Can spin
Mask

Cons:
Is a little fragile

author: wakproductions
title: Good scout ship, but bulky
review: Very sturdy design.  The antennae could be weapons or sensing devices.  One thing i do not like about the UFO themed saucer plates is that it is difficult for the ship to take "damage" in combat... i guess that is good for the aliens!
